已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的构造器
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.DisplayMetricsHolder.getWindowDisplayMetrics()
    Use DisplayMetricsHolder.getScreenDisplayMetrics() instead. See comment above as to why this is not correct to use.
    com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseActivityEventListener.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
    use BaseActivityEventListener.onActivityResult(Activity, int, int, Intent) instead.
    com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager.onHostDestroy()
    use ReactInstanceManager.onHostDestroy(Activity) instead
    com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager.onHostPause()
    Use ReactInstanceManager.onHostPause(Activity) instead.
    com.facebook.react.bridge.Promise.reject(String)
    Prefer passing a module-specific error code to JS. Using this method will pass the error code "EUNSPECIFIED".
    com.facebook.react.bridge.PromiseImpl.reject(String)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setRotation(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setScaleX(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setScaleY(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setTranslateX(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setTranslateY(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.DisplayMetricsHolder.setWindowDisplayMetrics(DisplayMetrics)
    Use DisplayMetricsHolder.setScreenDisplayMetrics(DisplayMetrics) instead. See comment above as to why this is not correct to use.
  • 已过时的构造器 
    构造器和说明
    com.facebook.react.views.text.ReactTextUpdate(Spannable, int, boolean, float, float, float, float, int)
    Use a non-deprecated constructor for ReactTextUpdate instead. This one remains because it's being used by a unit test that isn't currently open source.
